title: The 'Lakshmi' Mangalsutra Pendant: A Modern Take on Timeless Tradition
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Durable and tarnish-resistant plating ensures longevity. Features traditional black beads.
features: This Mangalsutra pendant features a modern, square design with a double halo of sparkling CZ stones surrounding a central CZ. The intricate setting maximizes brilliance and fire. The delicate chain interspersed with traditional black beads adds a cultural touch.
occasions: and special occasions. An elegant and understated option for modern brides.
description: This Mangalsutra beautifully blends tradition with a contemporary aesthetic. The high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting shine. It's a meaningful symbol of marriage with a modern twist, perfect for the discerning woman.
